# build service
set(SOURCE_FILES
    Parser.cpp
    TextImpl.common.cpp

    # Files below generated by ragel compiler generator
    TextImpl.scanner.cpp
)

add_library(Protocol ${SOURCE_FILES})
RAGEL_TARGET(Protocol TextImpl.scanner.rl ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/TextImpl.scanner.cpp)
target_link_libraries(Protocol Execute ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT})
